script: Start-Process powershell "certutil -addstore root $dir\$certification;Add-AppxPackage '$dir\$app';Get-AppxPackage | Select Publisher, PackageFullName | ForEach-Object -Process{ if (`$_.Publisher -match 'xiaoyaocz'){move-AppxPackage -Package `$_.PackageFullName -Volume D:\} }" -Verb RunAs -WindowStyle hidden -wait
Get-AppxPackage | Select Publisher, PackageFullName | ForEach-Object -Process{ if ($_.Publisher -match 'xiaoyaocz'){$app = $_.PackageFullName} }
Start-Process powershell "Remove-AppxPackage -Package $app;certutil -delstore root xiaoyaocz" -Verb RunAs -WindowStyle hidden -wait
